name: MouseDodge (PakT)
description:
This game contains F words

This is a meme, but it has Leaderboards!

How to play:

Type a username and password and play. Don't reuse any passwords, there is almost no security here

Requires an internet connection for now, until I make a play as guest mode (which won't have access to the leaderboards)

Mouse the mouse to avoid incoming projectiles

Survive as long as you can and try to claim the first spot in the leaderboard

Left Click to slow time down

Hit a lightning line to refresh the slow time ability

Tell me about any bugs you find!
